MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a further update for customers affected by the unplanned power cut in the FK13 postcode area of Tillicoultry. Our team are continuing to work hard to carry out the necessary repairs to the fault within the Mayfield Avenue substation.  We have brought in additional staff and contractors to assist in the repairs and we now expect all remaining supplies to be restored in stages by midnight. We will need access to your property to reinstate your supply once the repair has been completed. Hot food and drinks are still available at Tillicoultry Primary School and will be throughout the duration of the evening. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:20pm on Thursday, 24th December 2020.
